cards.name: Isperia, Supreme Judge
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, you may draw a card.
cards.flavor: "I serve only justice. But through that duty, I serve all of Ravnica."

foreignPrintings.name: 至高の審判者、イスペリア

cards.name: Azorius Herald
cards.text:
Azorius Herald can't be blocked.
When Azorius Herald enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
When Azorius Herald enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {U} was spent to cast it.
cards.flavor:
"As peace should be-gentle yet unstoppable."
-Augustin IV

cards.name: Azorius Justiciar
cards.text: When Azorius Justiciar enters the battlefield, detain up to two target creatures your opponents control. (Until your next turn, those creatures can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)
cards.flavor: "Your potential to commit a crime warrants further investigation."

foreignPrintings.name: アゾリウスの大司法官

cards.name: Stoic Ephemera
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
When Stoic Ephemera blocks, sacrifice it at end of combat.
cards.flavor: "Life is fleeting, and so is death. Only the oath is eternal."

cards.name: Court Hussar
cards.text:
Vigilance
When Court Hussar enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, then put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
When Court Hussar enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {W} was spent to cast it.

cards.name: Hover Barrier
cards.text: Defender, flying
cards.flavor: As whispers and rumors increased, so did the demand for fail-safe barriers.

cards.name: Archon of the Triumvirate
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Archon of the Triumvirate attacks, detain up to two target nonland permanents your opponents control. (Until your next turn, those permanents can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)

cards.name: Azorius Charm
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.
• Draw a card.
• Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library.

cards.name: Azorius Guildmage
cards.text:
{2}{W}: Tap target creature.
{2}{U}: Counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

foreignPrintings.name: アゾリウスのギルド魔道士

cards.name: Detention Sphere
cards.text:
When Detention Sphere enters the battlefield, you may exile target nonland permanent not named Detention Sphere and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent.
When Detention Sphere leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.

cards.name: Dovescape
cards.text:
({W/U} can be paid with either {W} or {U}.)
Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, counter that spell. That player creates X 1/1 white and blue Bird creature tokens with flying, where X is the spell's converted mana cost.

cards.name: Dramatic Rescue
cards.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. You gain 2 life.
cards.flavor:
"I never thought I'd be so glad to see two tons of beak and claws bearing down on me at the speed of an arrow."
-Mirela, Azorius hussar

cards.name: Isperia the Inscrutable
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Isperia the Inscrutable deals combat damage to a player, choose a card name. That player reveals their hand. If a card with the chosen name is revealed this way, search your library for a creature card with flying, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

foreignPrintings.name: 不可解なるイスペリア

cards.name: Judge's Familiar
cards.text:
Flying
Sacrifice Judge's Familiar: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.
cards.flavor:
"It misses nothing and it has no sense of humor."
-Barvisa, courtroom scribe

cards.name: Lavinia of the Tenth
cards.text:
Protection from red
When Lavinia of the Tenth enters the battlefield, detain each nonland permanent your opponents control with converted mana cost 4 or less. (Until your next turn, those permanents can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)

cards.name: Lyev Skyknight
cards.text:
Flying
When Lyev Skyknight enters the battlefield, detain target nonland permanent an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that permanent can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

cards.name: Pride of the Clouds
cards.text:
Flying
Pride of the Clouds gets +1/+1 for each other creature with flying on the battlefield.
Forecast - {2}{W}{U}, Reveal Pride of the Clouds from your hand: Create a 1/1 white and blue Bird creature token with flying. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

cards.name: Render Silent
cards.text: Counter target spell. Its controller can't cast spells this turn.
cards.flavor: "We have confiscated your spells as evidence. Once we conclude our investigation, you may petition to have them returned."

cards.name: Sky Hussar
cards.text:
Flying
When Sky Hussar enters the battlefield, untap all creatures you control.
Forecast - Tap two untapped white and/or blue creatures you control, Reveal Sky Hussar from your hand: Draw a card. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

cards.name: Skymark Roc
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Skymark Roc attacks, you may return target creature defending player controls with toughness 2 or less to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"Try not to look guilty. Or delicious."
-Thorpe, street urchin

cards.name: Sphinx's Revelation
cards.text: You gain X life and draw X cards.
cards.flavor: "Let the knowledge of absolute law inspire you to live a life of absolute order."

cards.name: Windreaver
cards.text:
Flying
{W}: Windreaver gains vigilance until end of turn.
{W}: Windreaver gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
{U}: Switch Windreaver's power and toughness until end of turn.
{U}: Return Windreaver to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Azorius Keyrune
cards.text:
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
{W}{U}: Azorius Keyrune becomes a 2/2 white and blue Bird artifact creature with flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"The higher the mind soars, the greater its understanding of the law."
-Isperia

cards.name: Azorius Signet
cards.flavor: The maze-like design embodies the core of Azorius law-strict structure designed to test wills and stall change.

cards.name: Azorius Chancery
cards.text:
Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield tapped.
When Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {W}{U}.

foreignPrintings.name: アゾリウスの大法官庁

cards.name: Teysa, Orzhov Scion
cards.text:
Sacrifice three white creatures: Exile target creature.
Whenever another black creature you control dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
cards.flavor: "Spend your life betraying me if you wish. I'll simply take it up with your ghost."

foreignPrintings.name: オルゾフの御曹子、テイサ

cards.name: Belfry Spirit
cards.text:
Flying
Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.)
When Belfry Spirit enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, create two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying.

cards.name: Martyred Rusalka
cards.text: {W}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature can't attack this turn.
cards.flavor: Rakdos cultists hanged her for sport in the township square. Her ghost now stands vigil at what has become known as the Tree of Weeping.

cards.name: Keening Banshee
cards.text:
Flying
When Keening Banshee enters the battlefield, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Her cold wail echoes in the alleys and under-eaves, finding the unfortunate and turning their blood to ice.

cards.name: Plagued Rusalka
cards.text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Look at her, once filled with innocence. Death has a way of wringing away such . . . deficiencies."
-Savra

cards.name: Pontiff of Blight
cards.text:
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
Other creatures you control have extort. (If a creature has multiple instances of extort, each triggers separately.)

cards.name: Skeletal Vampire
cards.text:
Flying
When Skeletal Vampire enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying.
{3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a Bat: Create two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying.
Sacrifice a Bat: Regenerate Skeletal Vampire.

cards.name: Stab Wound
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 2 life.

cards.name: Ultimate Price
cards.text: Destroy target monocolored creature.
cards.flavor:
"Let him be an example to others who would default on their debts to us."
-"The Cozen," Orzhov assassin

cards.name: Angel of Despair
cards.text:
Flying
When Angel of Despair enters the battlefield, destroy target permanent.
cards.flavor:
"I feel in them a sense of duty and commitment, yet I can feel nothing else. It is as if their duty is to an empty void."
-Razia

cards.name: Deathpact Angel
cards.text:
Flying
When Deathpact Angel dies, create a 1/1 white and black Cleric creature token. It has "{3}{W}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Return a card named Deathpact Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield."

cards.name: Debtors' Knell
cards.text:
({W/B} can be paid with either {W} or {B}.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
cards.flavor: One moment, conscious only of a sense of repose. The next moment, hearing the trudge of his own footsteps. He sighed and squinted into the glare ahead.

cards.name: Ghost Council of Orzhova
cards.text:
When Ghost Council of Orzhova enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
{1}, Sacrifice a creature: Exile Ghost Council of Orzhova. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

foreignPrintings.name: オルゾヴァの幽霊議員

cards.name: One Thousand Lashes
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 1 life.

cards.name: Orzhov Charm
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Return target creature you control and all Auras you control attached to it to their owner's hand.
• Destroy target creature and you lose life equal to its toughness.
• Return target creature card with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Orzhov Pontiff
cards.text:
Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.)
When Orzhov Pontiff enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, choose one -
• Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
• Creatures you don't control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Pillory of the Sleepless
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life."
cards.flavor: Which is worse-the sleep which never ends or that which never comes?

cards.name: Sin Collector
cards.text: When Sin Collector enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it and exile that card.
cards.flavor: "That must weigh heavily on your soul. Let me purge it for you."

cards.name: Treasury Thrull
cards.text:
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
Whenever Treasury Thrull attacks, you may return target artifact, creature, or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Vizkopa Guildmage
cards.text:
{1}{W}{B}: Target creature gains lifelink until end of turn.
{1}{W}{B}: Whenever you gain life this turn, each opponent loses that much life.

foreignPrintings.name: ヴィズコーパのギルド魔道士

cards.name: Orzhov Signet
cards.flavor: The form of the sigil is just as important as the sigil itself. If it's carried on a medallion, its bearer is a master. If it's tattooed on the body, its bearer is a slave.

cards.name: Orzhov Basilica
cards.text:
Orzhov Basilica enters the battlefield tapped.
When Orzhov Basilica enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {W}{B}.

cards.name: Rakdos, Lord of Riots
cards.text:
You can't cast this spell unless an opponent lost life this turn.
Flying, trample
Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each 1 life your opponents have lost this turn.

cards.name: Crypt Champion
cards.text:
Double strike
When Crypt Champion enters the battlefield, each player puts a creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from their graveyard onto the battlefield.
When Crypt Champion enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {R} was spent to cast it.

cards.name: Thrill-Kill Assassin
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: As the bounty on Massacre Girl rose, so did the number of imitators.

cards.name: Cackling Flames
cards.text:
Cackling Flames deals 3 damage to any target.
Hellbent - Cackling Flames deals 5 damage instead if you have no cards in hand.
cards.flavor:
"I like a little entertainment with my dinner."
-Rakdos

cards.name: Demonfire
cards.text:
Demonfire deals X damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
Hellbent - If you have no cards in hand, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.

cards.name: Rakdos Pit Dragon
cards.text:
{R}{R}: Rakdos Pit Dragon gains flying until end of turn.
{R}: Rakdos Pit Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Hellbent - Rakdos Pit Dragon has double strike as long as you have no cards in hand.

foreignPrintings.name: ラクドスの地獄ドラゴン

cards.name: Splatter Thug
cards.text:
First strike
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: The mask isn't meant to hide his identity. It's meant to keep the viscera out of his eyes.

cards.name: Utvara Hellkite
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, create a 6/6 red Dragon creature token with flying.
cards.flavor: The fear of dragons is as old and as powerful as the fear of death itself.

foreignPrintings.name: ウトヴァラのヘルカイト

cards.name: Auger Spree
cards.text: Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Finally, a weapon the Boros can't confiscate!"
-Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

cards.name: Avatar of Discord
cards.text:
({B/R} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.)
Flying
When Avatar of Discord enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard two cards.
cards.flavor: Such is the power of Rakdos that even his shadow takes on a cruel life of its own.

cards.name: Carnival Hellsteed
cards.text:
First strike, haste
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: Its favorite treats are candied hands and sweet hearts.

foreignPrintings.name: Destrier des enfers de la foire

cards.name: Dreadbore
cards.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
cards.flavor: In Rakdos-controlled neighborhoods, everyone is part of the show.

cards.name: Jagged Poppet
cards.text:
Whenever Jagged Poppet is dealt damage, discard that many cards.
Hellbent - Whenever Jagged Poppet deals combat damage to a player, if you have no cards in hand, that player discards cards equal to the damage.
cards.flavor: Few puppets are so willing.

cards.name: Lyzolda, the Blood Witch
cards.text: {2}, Sacrifice a creature: Lyzolda, the Blood Witch deals 2 damage to any target if the sacrificed creature was red. Draw a card if the sacrificed creature was black.
cards.flavor: Sacrificial rites take place before an audience of cheering cultists, each begging to be the next on stage.

cards.name: Master of Cruelties
cards.text:
First strike, deathtouch
Master of Cruelties can only attack alone.
Whenever Master of Cruelties attacks a player and isn't blocked, that player's life total becomes 1. Master of Cruelties assigns no combat damage this combat.

cards.name: Rakdos Cackler
cards.text: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: Devil-blades and dripping blood make music Rakdos never tires of hearing.

cards.name: Rakdos Charm
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.
• Destroy target artifact.
• Each creature deals 1 damage to its controller.

cards.name: Rakdos Guildmage
cards.text:
({B/R} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.)
{3}{B}, Discard a card: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
{3}{R}: Create a 2/1 red Goblin creature token with haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

foreignPrintings.name: ラクドスのギルド魔道士

cards.name: Rakdos Shred-Freak
cards.text: Haste
cards.flavor: "If there were such a thing as a soul, I think it would be behind the gallbladder but above the kidneys."

foreignPrintings.name: ラクドスの切り刻み教徒

cards.name: Rakdos the Defiler
cards.text:
Flying, trample
Whenever Rakdos the Defiler attacks, sacrifice half the non-Demon permanents you control, rounded up.
Whenever Rakdos deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices half the non-Demon permanents they control, rounded up.

cards.name: Rakdos's Return
cards.text: Rakdos's Return deals X damage to target opponent or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller discards X cards.
cards.flavor: When Lord Rakdos stirred from his slumber, everyone else's nightmare began.

cards.name: Riot Spikes
cards.text:
({B/R} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/-1.
cards.flavor: Most auramancers would have let the spikes hover just above the skin. Having the spikes rip through the skin from beneath was a touch added by Rakdos himself.

cards.name: Wrecking Ball
cards.text: Destroy target creature or land.
cards.flavor: Rakdos festivals almost leave enough rubble in their wake to hide the bodies.

cards.name: Rakdos Keyrune
cards.text:
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
{B}{R}: Rakdos Keyrune becomes a 3/1 black and red Devil artifact creature with first strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The Rakdos use it for everything you can think of and plenty more than that.

cards.name: Rakdos Signet
cards.flavor: Made of bone and boiled in blood, a Rakdos signet is not considered finished until it has been used as a murder weapon.

cards.name: Rakdos Carnarium
cards.text:
Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield tapped.
When Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {B}{R}.

cards.name: Ruric Thar, the Unbowed
cards.text:
Vigilance, reach
Ruric Thar, the Unbowed attacks each combat if able.
Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, Ruric Thar deals 6 damage to that player.

foreignPrintings.name: 自由なる者ルーリク・サー

cards.name: Skarrgan Firebird
cards.text:
Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.)
Flying
{R}{R}{R}: Return Skarrgan Firebird from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only if an opponent was dealt damage this turn.

cards.name: Birds of Paradise
cards.text:
Flying
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
cards.flavor: Long ago, birds of paradise littered the skies. Thanks to the city's sprawl, most now exist as pets of society's elite.

cards.name: Protean Hulk
cards.text: When Protean Hulk dies, search your library for any number of creature cards with total converted mana cost 6 or less and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor:
"Meat and eggs. We eat!"
-Borborygmos

cards.name: Skarrgan Pit-Skulk
cards.text:
Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Creatures with power less than Skarrgan Pit-Skulk's power can't block it.

cards.name: Wasteland Viper
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Bloodrush - {G}, Discard Wasteland Viper: Target attacking creature gets +1/+2 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"The Gruul embrace all things poisonous and living in the cracks of society."
-Teysa Karlov

cards.name: Wurmweaver Coil
cards.text:
Enchant green creature
Enchanted creature gets +6/+6.
{G}{G}{G}, Sacrifice Wurmweaver Coil: Create a 6/6 green Wurm creature token.
cards.flavor: Some use magic to spy through walls. Others use it to crush them.

cards.name: Borborygmos
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever Borborygmos deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
cards.flavor:
"It's easy to see why those Gruul dirtbags follow him-the only orders he gives are 'Crush them!' and 'We eat!'"
-Teysa Karlov

cards.name: Burning-Tree Emissary
cards.text: When Burning-Tree Emissary enters the battlefield, add {R}{G}.
cards.flavor: Those who regard the Gruul as savage simpletons underestimate the subtle power of their shamans.

cards.name: Burning-Tree Shaman
cards.text: Whenever a player activates an ability that isn't a mana ability, Burning-Tree Shaman deals 1 damage to that player.
cards.flavor: Gruul shamans are bent on punishing the civilized. Any act more complex than rubbing sticks together or eating with utensils is met with the stinging burn of their magic.

cards.name: Ghor-Clan Rampager
cards.text:
Trample
Bloodrush - {R}{G}, Discard Ghor-Clan Rampager: Target attacking creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"The Simic come from the cold slow depths. How could they understand the fire in a wild heart?"
-Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

cards.name: Giant Solifuge
cards.text:
({R/G} can be paid with either {R} or {G}.)
Trample; haste; shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor:
"We respect all lifeforms, but this one we respect from a distance."
-Mandor, Selesnya ranger

cards.name: Gruul Charm
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Creatures without flying can't block this turn.
• Gain control of all permanents you own.
• Gruul Charm deals 3 damage to each creature with flying.
cards.flavor:
"Not Gruul? Then die!"
-Borborygmos

cards.name: Pit Fight
cards.text: Target creature you control fights another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
cards.flavor:
"All the coins in Ravnica can't save his soul now."
-Narbulg Nine Fingers

cards.name: Rubblebelt Raiders
cards.text: Whenever Rubblebelt Raiders attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each attacking creature you control.
cards.flavor:
"This city will perish, and the Gruul will cheer as the boar-god crushes the last bricks into dust."
-Nikya of the Old Ways

cards.name: Rubblehulk
cards.text:
Rubblehulk's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.
Bloodrush - {1}{R}{G}, Discard Rubblehulk: Target attacking creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of lands you control.

cards.name: Rumbling Slum
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Rumbling Slum deals 1 damage to each player.
cards.flavor: The Orzhov contract the Izzet to animate slum districts and banish them to the wastes. The Gruul adopt them and send them back to the city for vengeance.

cards.name: Savage Twister
cards.text: Savage Twister deals X damage to each creature.
cards.flavor:
"Nature is the ultimate mindless destroyer, capable of power and ferocity no army can match, and the Gruul follow its example."
-Trigori, Azorius senator

cards.name: Savageborn Hydra
cards.text:
Double strike
Savageborn Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{R/G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Savageborn Hydra. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

foreignPrintings.name: 野蛮生まれのハイドラ

cards.name: Scab-Clan Mauler
cards.text:
Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.)
Trample
cards.flavor: They inflict pain to forget their own and break foes to feel whole.

cards.name: Ulasht, the Hate Seed
cards.text:
Ulasht, the Hate Seed enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other red creature you control and a +1/+1 counter on it for each other green creature you control.
{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Ulasht: Choose one -
• Ulasht deals 1 damage to target creature.
• Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

cards.name: Zhur-Taa Druid
cards.text:
{T}: Add {G}.
Whenever you tap Zhur-Taa Druid for mana, it deals 1 damage to each opponent.
cards.flavor: "Only the decadent think magic should be pristine and without cost."

cards.name: Zhur-Taa Swine
cards.text: Bloodrush - {1}{R}{G}, Discard Zhur-Taa Swine: Target attacking creature gets +5/+4 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Gurley was the first to domesticate one, though his widow didn't take much solace in that accomplishment.

cards.name: Gruul Signet
cards.flavor: Gruul territorial markings need not be legible. The blood, snot, and muck used to smear them are unmistakably Gruul.

cards.name: Gruul Turf
cards.text:
Gruul Turf enters the battlefield tapped.
When Gruul Turf enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {R}{G}.

cards.name: Zegana, Utopian Speaker
cards.text:
When Zegana, Utopian Speaker enters the battlefield, if you control another creature with a +1/+1 counter on it, draw a card.
{4}{G}{U}: Adapt 4. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

foreignPrintings.name: 楽園党の議長、ゼガーナ

cards.name: Cloudfin Raptor
cards.text:
Flying
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

cards.name: Rapid Hybridization
cards.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller creates a 3/3 green Frog Lizard creature token.
cards.flavor:
"We've merged your life essence with that of several creatures at once. You're welcome."
-Speaker Trifon

cards.name: Cytoplast Root-Kin
cards.text:
Graft 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
When Cytoplast Root-Kin enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{2}: Move a +1/+1 counter from target creature you control onto Cytoplast Root-Kin.

cards.name: Experiment One
cards.text:
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
Remove two +1/+1 counters from Experiment One: Regenerate Experiment One.

cards.name: Gyre Sage
cards.text:
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
{T}: Add {G} for each +1/+1 counter on Gyre Sage.

cards.name: Miming Slime
cards.text: Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.
cards.flavor:
"We paid the Simic very well for this capability, but we should quickly recoup our expenses in saved wages."
-Milana, Orzhov prelate

cards.name: Vinelasher Kudzu
cards.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Vinelasher Kudzu.
cards.flavor: It grows to hate you.

cards.name: Coiling Oracle
cards.text: When Coiling Oracle enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.
cards.flavor: Snaking remnants of nature directed by a body of thought and progress, the oracles embody all that is Simic.

cards.name: Elusive Krasis
cards.text:
Elusive Krasis can't be blocked.
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

cards.name: Experiment Kraj
cards.text:
Experiment Kraj has all activated abilities of each other creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
cards.flavor:
"Of course it will grow beyond control-it was designed to choose its own evolution."
-Momir Vig

cards.name: Fathom Mage
cards.text:
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
Whenever a +1/+1 counter is put on Fathom Mage, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Momir Vig, Simic Visionary
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a green creature spell, you may search your library for a creature card and reveal it. If you do, shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
Whenever you cast a blue creature spell, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put that card into your hand.

foreignPrintings.name: シミックの幻想家、モミール・ヴィグ

cards.name: Nimbus Swimmer
cards.text:
Flying
Nimbus Swimmer enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
cards.flavor: The Simic soon discovered that the sky offered as few constraints on size as the sea.

cards.name: Omnibian
cards.text: {T}: Target creature becomes a Frog with base power and toughness 3/3 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"This creature has hyperevolved chameleonic abilities. It no longer mimics its surroundings, instead forcing them to take on its form."
-Simic research notes

cards.name: Plaxcaster Frogling
cards.text:
Graft 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
{2}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

cards.name: Progenitor Mimic
cards.text: You may have Progenitor Mimic enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it has "At the beginning of your upkeep, if this creature isn't a token, create a token that's a copy of this creature."

cards.name: Simic Sky Swallower
cards.text:
Flying, trample
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor:
"We've bred out the shortcomings of the species' natural form and replaced them with assets of our own design."
-Momir Vig

cards.name: Trygon Predator
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Trygon Predator deals combat damage to a player, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment that player controls.
cards.flavor: Held aloft by metabolized magic, trygons are ravenous for sources of mystic fuel.

cards.name: Urban Evolution
cards.text: Draw three cards. You may play an additional land this turn.
cards.flavor: As the Simic released more of their krasis experiments, they required new habitats, always at the expense of the locals.

cards.name: Voidslime
cards.text: Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
cards.flavor:
"It is technically an ooze, but its lifespan measures only seconds. In that short time, its appetite for magic is extraordinary."
-Simic research notes

cards.name: Vorel of the Hull Clade
cards.text: {G}{U}, {T}: Double the number of each kind of counter on target artifact, creature, or land.
cards.flavor: "I used to hurl rocks and eat scraps of meat burned over a fire. Look at what I've become and tell me Simic does not hold infinite possibility."

foreignPrintings.name: Vorel del Clado de la Vaina

cards.name: Zameck Guildmage
cards.text:
{G}{U}: This turn, each creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
{G}{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Draw a card.

foreignPrintings.name: ザーメクのギルド魔道士

cards.name: Simic Signet
cards.flavor: For the Simic Combine, its sigil serves not as an emblem of honor but as a trademark. Its familiar image on any biological commodity attests to superb craftsmanship, ingenious innovation, and higher cost.

cards.name: Simic Growth Chamber
cards.text:
Simic Growth Chamber enters the battlefield tapped.
When Simic Growth Chamber enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {G}{U}.
